resources.name: Clubhouse API
resources.description:
![logo](https://cdn.iphoneincanada.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/clubhouse.png) [Clubhouse](https://www.joinclubhouse.com/) is a new type of network based on voice. When you open the app you can see ‚Äúrooms‚Äù full of people talking‚Äîall open so you can hop in and out, exploring different conversations. You enter each room as an audience member, but if you want to talk you just raise your hand, and the speakers can choose to invite you up. Or you can create a room of your own. It‚Äôs a place to meet with friends and with new people around the world‚Äîto tell stories, ask questions, debate, learn, and have impromptu conversations on thousands of different topics. # Authentication There is a multi-level authentication by phone number : - Check user's status and send verification code via SMS ( or call the person to say verification code ) - Check verification code and deliver `auth_token`, `access_token` and `refresh_token` # Start At first you need some collection variables : - `auth_token` - `user_id` - Phone number - Email address There is a script in **Complete** request to set `auth_token` and `user_id`. Otherwise, enter them manually. Also, you need to set your **phone number** and **email address**. ## Support [![Donate with Bitcoin](https://en.cryptobadges.io/badge/micro/3GhT2ABRuHuXGNzP6DH5KvLZRTXCBKkx2y)](https://en.cryptobadges.io/donate/3GhT2ABRuHuXGNzP6DH5KvLZRTXCBKkx2y) [![Donate with Ethereum](https://en.cryptobadges.io/badge/micro/0x0831bD72Ea8904B38Be9D6185Da2f930d6078094)](https://en.cryptobadges.io/donate/0x0831bD72Ea8904B38Be9D6185Da2f930d6078094) [![ko-fi](https://www.ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/D1D1WGU9)
## Contributing & Issues Each project may have many problems. Contributing to the better development of this project by reporting them. **Email**: [info@arash-hatami.ir](mailto:info@arash-hatami.ir) **Website**: [https://arash-hatami.ir](https://arash-hatami.ir)

resources.name: Check
resources.description: Check user's status and send verification code via SMS.

resources.name: Authentication
resources.description:
There is a multi-level authentication by phone number :

- Check user's status  
- Call person to say verification code  
- Receive verification code and deliver `auth_token`, `access_token`and `refresh_token`

resources.name: Call
resources.description: Call the person and send verification message if SMS not delivered.

resources.name: Complete
resources.description:
Complete phone number authentication. This should return `auth_token`, `access_token`, `refresh_token`, `is_waitlisted`, ... 
 
Please note that output may be different depending on the status of the authenticated user

resources.name: Release Notes
resources.description: Get release notes

resources.name: Other
resources.description: Other useful API endpoints for Clubhouse

resources.name: Check For Update
resources.description: Check for app updates

resources.name: Waitlist Status
resources.description: Check whether you're still on a waitlist or not

resources.name: User
resources.description:
User related API endpoints like :  

- Get information & settings
- Get followers / followings
- Follow / Unfollow other users

resources.name: Add Email
resources.description: Request for email verification. You only need to do this once.

resources.name: Settings
resources.description: Receive user's settings.

resources.name: Me
resources.description: Get my information.

resources.name: Follow User
resources.description:
Follow a user.  
Different value for `source` may require different parameters to be set. The default value is 4

resources.name: Unfollow User
resources.description: Unfollow a user.

resources.name: Block
resources.description: Block a user.

resources.name: Unblock
resources.description: Unblock a user.

resources.name: Followings
resources.description: Get following of the given `user_id`

resources.name: Followers
resources.description: Get followers of the given `user_id`

resources.name: Online Friends
resources.description: List all online friends.

resources.name: Profile
resources.description: Lookup someone else's profile.

resources.name: Clubs
resources.description: Get list of clubs the user's in.

resources.name: Search
resources.description: Search users based on the given query.

resources.name: Logout
resources.description: Logout from current session.

resources.name: Channel ( Room )
resources.description: Channel related API endpoints.

resources.name: Get Channels
resources.description: Get list of channels, based on the server's channel selection algorithm.

resources.name: Get Channel
resources.description: Get information of the given channel.

resources.name: Create Channel
resources.description: Create a new channel.

resources.name: End Channel
resources.description: Kick everyone and close the channel. Requires **moderator** privilege.

resources.name: Invite User
resources.description: Invite someone to a currently joined channel. It will send a ping notification to the given `user_id`.

resources.name: Hide Channel
resources.description: Hide/Unhide the channel from the channel list.

resources.name: Leave Channel
resources.description: Leave the given channel.

resources.name: Join Channel
resources.description: Join the given channel.

resources.name: Search
resources.description: Search clubs based on the given query.

resources.name: Club
resources.description: Club related API endpoints

resources.name: Information
resources.description: Get the information about the given `club_id`.

resources.name: Members
resources.description: Get list of members on the given `club_id`.

resources.name: Follow
resources.description: Follow a club.

resources.name: Unfollow
resources.description: Unfollow a club.
